infos.value: Ouch... Heh heh, you guys are really going for it!
But don't go thinking your petty little foray is enough to fell us.
Yeah, that's right. We're made of a different mettle than you lot.
P-please, hold! You're members of «Rubeus», are you not?
I wish to talk. Stay your swords!
If you're going to make excuses...make them in hell!
It's no use, Lord Mont. We must fight!
Alas... Avoid harming them if you can—they're our allies!
Understood. We'll take it easy on them...as much as we can, anyway.
